column9: I started getting migraines when I was 13 and they would be so bad that I couldn't get out of bed for days. I thought I'd tried everything on the market (& when I say everything, I mean 17 different medications over the course of 5 years!). My doctor came across this RX and decided to give it a shot and I'm glad she did! This medicine has completely relieved me of my symptoms! Since I've started taking it I get maybe 1 a month as apposed to the usual 5-ish a week. I'm very confident in this medicine!!!

column2: Dark Legacy, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Taking this drug only worked on my minor headaches, but as for my migranes it didn't even ease it up.  Though taking into consideration that this is just the begining, and there may be something else causing my migranes.  If that is the case then of course this medication wont work.  Only time will tell, and one other thing that has to be taken into consideration is that not all medication reacts the same way with everyone.  It may be different from person to person.  So if the doctor gives it to you then try it.  I still take it for my minor headaches.  They work wonders on stopping them instantly.
